extension_description.message: Defines & remembers highlights made to text on websites

page_action_title_not_in_dom.message: Unable to match all highlights on the page

confirm_remove_all_highlights.message: Are you sure you wish to remove all the highlights on this page?

tooltip_copy_highlight.message: Copy the highlighted text to the Clipboard

confirm_remove_all_pages.message: This operation can't be undone. Are you sure you wish to remove all highlights on all pages?

pages_empty.message: Nothing to see here, move along

confirm_reset_default_styles.message: This operation can't be undone. Are you sure you wish to restore the default styles?

confirm_remove_style.message: This operation can't be undone. Are you sure you wish to remove this style?

options_tab_page_header_sites.message: Click on a highlight definition to change its style.

options_tab_page_header_pages.message: The following web pages contain highlights.

highlight_help_keyboard_shortcut.message: A keyboard shortcut can be assigned to any of the first 10 styles. Use the 'Keyboard shortcuts' option, located at the bottom right of Chrome's main 'Extensions' page (also accessible via the Tools menu).

alert_create_highlight_in_subframe.message: Creating a highlight within a subframe of a page is currently unsupported.

alert_create_highlight_in_editable.message: Unable to create a highlight within an editable text box.

warning_file_access_required.message: NB: This is an offline page (stored locally in a file). The highlights it contains can only be shown if 'Allow access to file URLs' is enabled for this extension. You may choose to do this via the 'Extensions' tool page.

experimental_header.message: Caution! Items in this section should be considered experimental, not fully tested, and subject to change, so be careful!

experimental_database_export_description.message: Saves a file containing the URL of each highlighted page, the location of the highlights on that page, and all currently defined styles. If you haven't enabled the 'Ask where to save each file before downloading' option in Chrome, the file will probably be saved in your Downloads folder.

experimental_database_import_description.message: Replace the highlights and styles with those previously exported into a file. NOTE: ALL existing highlights on ALL pages will be replaced, along with ALL modified highlight styles.
